item.title: Aelio
item.description: Aelio is one of the regions on Halpha . Within it there are nine areas (most of which do not have entries on the wiki, as there isn’t much RP in those areas): Central City North Aelio West Aelio Central Aelio South Aelio Resol Forest Halphia Lake Mt. Magnus Vanford Laboratory Ruins

item.title: Central City
item.description: About the city: Central City is the capital of Aelio , where most Native Halphans and Meteorns reside (and a lot of cats)! The city has a plethora of places to hangout at - the café, the park, hangout spot by the residential zone, and even a shop area. Logs! Lilit and Rosie’s First Interaction

item.title: Characters:
item.description: From The Patrons : Nora Honora (Leader) Equinox Lilit Lichenaes Gaia Stellaria Gogo Mes Unaffiliated (that I know of, @ me if you want anything changed): RO-C Yokai (to be written) Yumesaki (to be written) Meteor Molly (to be written) Sophia Lorre (to be written) Haraki (to be written)

item.title: Equinox
item.description: Details: Name: Equinox Nickname: Light or Nox Race: Deuman/Kitsune Hybrid Height: 170cms Age: 23 years old Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Operative - Healer, Assassin Pronouns: She/They Personality: Equinox shows basic emotion around others while her Light Personality is in control and finds it incredibly difficult to trust people other than Nox (Dark Personality) and she rather that she keep to herself so that past events don’t repeat themselves.

item.title: Gaia Stellaria
item.description: ‘‘I don’t know what I am doing, just making stuff up as I go and I am pretty good at that.'' Details: Name: Tianea ‘Gaia’ Stellaria Race: Self gene-spliced Newman Height: 180 cms Age: 30 years old (as of episode 5) Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Explorer, Scientist, Engineer, Recon Weaponry: Generally equipped with a prototype she made herself. Often a form of ranged weapon or knuckle weapons. Pronouns: She/her, but no preference Background: Tianea is an orphan from another ship.

item.title: Gogo Mes
item.description: “If you have an issue with something, you can count on me!” Details: Name: Gogo Mes Race: Raptor Height: 168 cms Age: 20 years old Gender: Woman Occupation: Guard on home planet. Weaponry: Dual-wielding guns. Pronouns: She/They Personality: Insert personality here. Background: She’s the girlfriend of Lilit . Artworks: All artworks above are made by Mantispray (Twitter)

item.title: Halpha
item.description: Logs in this place: Most of the logs Types of people who reside on the planet: Halpha is home to a great amount of people, some of whom have lived there for generations, others who’ve just arrived. Native Halphans Native Halphans are those who’ve lived on Halpha all of their lives, and even have family going back a long time. Meteorns Meteorns are people who’ve crashed onto Halpha , typically in smaller pods.

item.title: Lady Lilit Lichenaes of Atlantis and Mercia III
item.description: ‘‘You don’t wanna know what I did to get these legs." (You really don’t wanna know…) Details: Name: Lilit Lichenaes Race: Fish person Height: 200 cms Age: Several hundreds of years, but visually and mentally between 22-24. (Fish people age slowly) Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Heir to the throne Weaponry: Ice rod or bow. She likes it ranged. Pronouns: She/They Personality: She towers over most people she meets and stands out a lot in Halpha .

item.title: Lilit And Rosie's First Interaction
Locations
item.description: Halpha Aelio Central City Retem (once it comes ;-;)

item.title: Nora Honora
item.description: “Did someone say fire? No…? …must’ve misheard tea - coming up!~” Details: Name: Nora Honora Race: Gene-spliced Deuman (Deuman-cat mix) Height: 155 cms Age: 17 years old Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Waitress (retconned till further notice), ARKs defender, Ranger/gunner Pronouns: She/They (But doesn’t mind anything else) Personality: Nora could be characterized as a plethora of things; many would say that she’s a neurotic piece of work that is crude, mischievous and snarky.

item.title: Nora, Gaia, Rosie and Glitch meet.
Rosie
item.description: “Uwah!~” Details: Name: Rosie Clements Race: Cast Height: 154 cms Age: 13 years old Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Student, civilian Pronouns: She/They Personality: Rosie is a reserved young girl who yearns to see the world beyond the walls of Central City . She can be described as a dreamer at heart, she tries to learn as much about Halpha through various recorded media and the stories and exploits of the ARKS defenders that she meets.

item.title: RP-Logs
item.description: If there are any typos or errors, feel free to send a message in #log-submission if there are any issues. Current logs that have been organized: First interactions: Lilit and RO-C’s First Interaction (Featuring Nora ~) Submitted logs

item.title: Submitted Logs:
item.description: Feel free to send in ‘valuable’ submissions in #log-submission on the Discord! No logs submitted.

item.title: The Patrons
item.description: Details: Alliance Name: The Patrons Ship: 03 - Thorn We usually hangs out on Block 26! Alliance Type: Roleplay Alliance Time Zone: CEST About: Most of us are very gay. 🏳️‍🌈 Members: Nora Honora (Leader) Equinox Lilit Gaia Stellaria Gogo Mes
